mapper.select: SELECT id, name, update_time FROM department WHERE is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY update_time DESC;
mapper.update: UPDATE department SET is_deleted = 1, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id} AND is_deleted = 0;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO department (name, create_time, update_time, is_deleted) VALUES (#{name}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{isDeleted})
